definition: can/may/able to/to approve/to permit/to suit/(particle used for emphasis) certainly/very

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: Solitary Beauty Peak locates in Guilin Prince City and is an integral part of the Prince City scenic area.
sentences.chinese: 獨秀峯位於桂林王城內，是王城景區不可分割的部分。

sentences.english: But within reason, flirting is part and parcel of our daily lives.
sentences.chinese: 但當然了，調情是我們日常生活中不可分割的一部分。

sentences.english: He's part of that Pink Panther group that held up a jewelry store in Paris.
sentences.chinese: 他是在巴黎開珠寶店的粉紅豹不可分割的一部分。

sentences.english: And is not time even as love is, undivided and paceless?
sentences.chinese: 難道時間不就像愛，是不可分割沒有間隙的麼？

sentences.english: The three aspects are integrated, equally important and inseparable.
sentences.chinese: 這三方面互爲聯繫，同等重要，不可分割。

sentences.english: Politics and civilization have inseparably intimate relation.
sentences.chinese: 政治與文明有着不可分割的關係。

sentences.english: All assigned Appendices and supplements (if any) constitute an integral part of the present Contract.
sentences.chinese: 所有的附件均視同爲合同的一個不可分割的部分。

sentences.english: Formerly known as the Western Territory, Xinjiang has been an inalienable part of China since ancient times.
sentences.chinese: 新疆古稱西域，自古以來就是中國不可分割的一部分。

sentences.english: Commodity ownership circulation and logistics constitute two inalienable aspects in the commodity circulation process.
sentences.chinese: 商流與物流是商品流通過程中不可分割的兩個方面。

sentences.english: And is not time even as love is , undivided and spaceless ?
sentences.chinese: 時間難道不正如愛，不可分割而又無邊無際嗎？

sentences.english: It's as integral to the soul - and life - as anything.
sentences.chinese: 這就像靈魂和生命般不可分割。

sentences.english: The interest of individuals is indissolubly linked with that of the country.
sentences.chinese: 個人利益同國家利益不可分割地聯繫在一起。

sentences.english: The list of Valued Addets in an integral part of this certificate.
sentences.chinese: 鑑定明細表》爲本證書不可分割之部分。

sentences.english: This Supplemental Agreement shall constitute an inseparable part of the Original Agreement.
sentences.chinese: 本補充協議構成原協議不可分割的部分。

sentences.english: The appendixes of the Contract shall be an integral part of the Contract.
sentences.chinese: 本合同附件是本合同不可分割的有效組成部分。

sentences.english: The content of fiction is inseparably interconnected with its form and structure.
sentences.chinese: 小說的內容和結構形態互爲因果，不可分割。

definition: to share the same interests (idiom)/to be closely related/to be in the same boat
to depend on sth for existence/dependent on
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
lit. as close as lips and teeth (idiom); closely related/interdependent
to oppose/to set sth against/to be antagonistic to/antithetical/relative opposite/opposing/diametrical
